abstract: AT&T sent an unsolicited ad touting “American Idol” to only 3 percent of its customers.
snippet: AT&T sent an unsolicited ad touting “American Idol” to only 3 percent of its customers.
lead_paragraph: A text message that AT&T Wireless sent out advertising Tuesday night’s season premiere of “American Idol” went out to roughly two million of the company’s 75 million subscribers, according to Mark Siegel, an AT&T spokesman.

headline.main: AT&T Says 2 Million Customers Got ‘Idol’ Text Ad
